name: leeringly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows sexual interest, especially when this is not wanted: He plays a leeringly sexist, physically and verbally aggressive, racist cop. He leeringly demanded to know the colour of her underwear.
More examplesFewer examplesIn this wooden horror movie, the camera pans leeringly over women's bodies.He questioned them leeringly on their sex lives, bugged their bedrooms, and provoked them into fights.He came up to us and leeringly asked us to join him and a male friend for a foursome.
